summary: AN ORDINANCE Concerning residential rental agreements, requiring that residential rental agreements for residential rental properties in the City of Seattle provide sixty (60) days prior written notice of any increase in housing charges that results in housing costs that are ten percent (10%) greater than that charged the same tenant for the same housing unit and services during the preceding twelve (12) months, and amending SMC 7.24.020, SMC 7.24.030, SMC 7.24.050, and SMC 7.24.060.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
